Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Southbound Reroute near Central Park/31st
ShortDescription: Southbound 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Central Park, 25th, Lawndale, 26th, Central Park and 31st:street blockage near Central Park/31st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Central Park, 25th, Lawndale, 26th, Central Park and 31st:street blockage near Central Park/31st.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
